2025-07-27 - SSM: Haress code deployment pipeline failed to deploy drive code | Resolution: SSM updated password for id used for Harness Artifactory connector | Root Cause: SSM implemented password of the service account, but only updated 1 harness password secret entry out of 2, causing id to be locked | Recommendation: In future, SSM should update both harness password secret entries when updating the password of the service account

2025-07-20 - DBA: Database connection error to prices database on host devhost08 | Resolution: DBA restarted the database service on dev08 | Root Cause: Database servie was terminated during Patching last night, causing the database to be inaccesible | Recommendation: In future, DBA should ensure that the database service is restarted after patching

2025-07-08 - Prod Ops: Production LRP restart_master_service as part of CTASK00378000 failed | Resolution: Prod Ops contacted Prod Control on call, and reset the Global values in UC4 | Root Cause: The Global values for service restart needs to be updated on a monthly basis | Recommendation: Prod Control needs to automate the global value via scheduled UC4 job

2025-07-08 - SCM: Shared services Config Deployment failed | Resolution: App services team regenerated the prod config and deployment was successful | Root Cause: Appconfigs for production environment were not generated | Recommendation: Dev teams should double check the config generation process before promoting to production repos

2025-07-06 - Network: F5 redirection script failed to redirect traffic to new server | Resolution: Network team on call was contacted, and they performed the redirection manually | Root Cause: The F5 redirection script failed for unknown reason, investigation is ongoing | Recommendation: N/A as the root cause is unknown

2025-06-29 - Data Services: Data Services on-call person did not show up to attend the on-call shift | Resolution: Secondary on-call person was contacted, and performed the assigned tasks | Root Cause: The primary on-call person had a personal emergency, but didn't inform the team | Recommendation: The on-call person should always inform the team if they are unable to attend the on-call shift, managers should also be informed

2025-06-20 - Release Engineering: After deployment of pricing modules, the Tomcat service did not start automatically | Resolution: SSM was contacted to manually restart TC services | Root Cause: The deployment script of pricing module had an update but did not point to the correct TC instance | Recommendation: Release team will perform update on pricing deployment script to fix this error

2025-06-12 - Middleware: WebLogic server failed to deploy WAR file during overnight release | Resolution: Middleware restarted the WebLogic server and redeployed WAR | Root Cause: The deployment job was triggered twice concurrently, causing lock conflict | Recommendation: Add lock mechanism in Jenkins pipeline to prevent concurrent runs

2025-06-03 - SSM: Harness pipeline failed at Artifactory fetch step | Resolution: SSM updated the repository credentials in the connector | Root Cause: Service account password expired but no alert was configured | Recommendation: Set up password expiration monitoring and proactive renewal alerts

2025-05-28 - DBA: Application failed to connect to Oracle database after patching | Resolution: DBA rolled back the patch and restarted the listener | Root Cause: Listener configuration was overwritten during Oracle patch installation | Recommendation: Manually back up listener.ora before applying any DB patches

2025-05-14 - Release Engineering: Post-deployment sanity checks did not trigger | Resolution: Manual sanity scripts were run by QA team | Root Cause: Deployment pipeline skipped sanity stage due to misconfigured if-condition | Recommendation: Review all pipeline conditionals as part of deployment validation

2025-05-05 - Network: VPN gateway unreachable during UAT release testing | Resolution: Network team restarted gateway service on edge router | Root Cause: VPN daemon had crashed during overnight config sync | Recommendation: Enable auto-restart for VPN services and monitor logs for crash patterns

2025-04-28 - QA: Automation test suite failed during pipeline run | Resolution: QA disabled flaky test cases and re-triggered suite | Root Cause: Recent code changes introduced race condition in UI test | Recommendation: Move unstable tests to nightly regression suite until fixed

2025-04-22 - SCM: Git tag for release was missing | Resolution: SCM manually applied release tag and notified downstream teams | Root Cause: Tagging step was removed in a recent Jenkinsfile update | Recommendation: Add tagging validation in pre-release pipeline steps

2025-04-10 - Data Services: Data sync to S3 bucket failed post-deployment | Resolution: Manual data upload completed by DataOps | Root Cause: IAM role lost permission to write to target S3 bucket | Recommendation: Include IAM permission checks in pre-release checklist

2025-03-29 - Middleware: JMS queue overflowed during release rollout | Resolution: Old messages purged; queue size increased | Root Cause: Backlog from previous release wasn't cleared before deployment | Recommendation: Add queue clean-up step in release pre-checks

2025-03-18 - Release Engineering: Code promotion to production repo failed | Resolution: Engineer manually pushed changes with correct GPG key | Root Cause: Build server lost SSH auth config to production Git repo | Recommendation: Automate validation of SSH key presence in build agent

2025-03-02 - QA: Release candidate was not deployed to QA environment | Resolution: Pipeline was re-run manually with corrected config | Root Cause: Environment variable for target QA env was misspelled | Recommendation: Add validation step to check env vars before deployment

2025-02-22 - SSM: Service health checks failed post-deployment | Resolution: SSM team restarted the failing pods and restored services | Root Cause: Service port config was changed without updating health check endpoints | Recommendation: Make port and endpoint mapping a mandatory checklist item

2025-02-10 - DBA: SQL scripts failed during deployment | Resolution: Manual execution with minor syntax fix | Root Cause: Version mismatch between script and target DB schema | Recommendation: Run pre-deployment schema diff to catch version mismatches

2024-11-13 - Middleware: WebLogic cluster failed to start during application deployment. | Resolution: Middleware team manually restarted cluster nodes and cleared stuck deployment artifacts. | Root Cause: Undocumented dependency in class loading order caused startup failure under certain JDK versions. | Recommendation: Document all critical classpath dependencies and enforce baseline JDK validation during builds.

2024-12-04 - Data Services: Data pipeline failed to ingest pricing feeds from external vendor API. | Resolution: Integration retry logic was triggered and backfilled missing data after 45 minutes. | Root Cause: API authentication token expired and was not rotated automatically. | Recommendation: Implement scheduled token refresh jobs and add alerting on authentication failures.

2024-12-11 - SCM: Production Git repository webhook failed to notify downstream CI pipelines. | Resolution: SCM re-registered the webhook and validated it with a manual push event. | Root Cause: An upgrade in GitLab broke webhook tokens due to format changes. | Recommendation: Test webhook behavior in staging before upgrading core SCM systems.

2025-03-02 - Data Services: Data pipeline failed to ingest pricing feeds from external vendor API. | Resolution: Integration retry logic was triggered and backfilled missing data after 45 minutes. | Root Cause: API authentication token expired and was not rotated automatically. | Recommendation: Implement scheduled token refresh jobs and add alerting on authentication failures.

2025-01-31 - Network: Users reported intermittent access issues to internal tools post deployment. | Resolution: The network team identified a routing issue and restored connectivity by reconfiguring the affected VLAN. | Root Cause: Deployment script triggered a restart of a core switch interface, resetting routing rules unexpectedly. | Recommendation: Audit all deployment scripts that touch networking infrastructure and isolate high-risk operations.

2025-06-20 - QA: Regression tests failed unexpectedly on the QA environment during the nightly pipeline. | Resolution: QA team analyzed the logs and found a mismatch in the test data set. Tests were updated and pipeline re-run successfully. | Root Cause: An automated data load process introduced incomplete records which caused test assertions to fail. | Recommendation: Introduce validation checks on nightly data load jobs and include them in the test pipeline gating.

2025-06-24 - SCM: Production Git repository webhook failed to notify downstream CI pipelines. | Resolution: SCM re-registered the webhook and validated it with a manual push event. | Root Cause: An upgrade in GitLab broke webhook tokens due to format changes. | Recommendation: Test webhook behavior in staging before upgrading core SCM systems.
